Vulnerability.name: MySQL vio_verify_callback() Zero-Depth X.509 Certificate Vulnerability

Description.p: The vio_verify_callback function in viosslfactories.c in MySQL 5.0.x before 5.0.88 and 5.1.x before 5.1.41, when OpenSSL is used, accepts a value of zero for the depth of X.509 certificates, which allows man-in-the-middle attackers to spoof arbitrary SSL-based MySQL servers via a crafted certificate, as demonstrated by a certificate presented by a server linked against the yaSSL library.

Vulnerability.name: MySQL yaSSL CertDecoder::GetName Multiple Buffer Overflows

Description.p: Multiple stack-based buffer overflows in the CertDecoder::GetName function in src/asn.cpp in TaoCrypt in yaSSL before 1.9.9, as used in mysqld in MySQL 5.0.x before 5.0.90, MySQL 5.1.x before 5.1.43, MySQL 5.5.x through 5.5.0-m2, and other products, allow remote attackers to execute arbitrary code or cause a denial of service (memory corruption and daemon crash) by establishing an SSL connection and sending an X.509 client certificate with a crafted name field, as demonstrated by mysql_overflow1.py and the vd_mysql5 module in VulnDisco Pack Professional 8.11. NOTE: this was originally reported for MySQL 5.0.51a.

Description.p: Oracle MySQL的MySQL Server組件(子組件: Server: Security: Encryption)中的漏洞. 受影響的支援版本是5.6.34及其更早版本和5.7.16及其更早版本. 易受攻擊的漏洞允許低權限的攻擊者通過多種協議訪問網路來破壞MySQL Server. 成功的攻擊需要攻擊者以外的人員進行交流,而漏洞在MySQL Server中,攻擊可能會顯著影響其他產品. 此漏洞的成功攻擊可能導致未經授權的功能,使得MySQL Server hang或經常重複的當機(完整的DOS). CVSS v3.0 Base Score 6.8 (可用性影響).

Solutions.summary: 升級到最新版本的 Oracle MySQL

Description.p: Oracle MySQL的MySQL Server組件中的漏洞 (子組件: 伺服器: Pluggable Auth). 受影響的支援版本是5.6.37及更早版本以及5.7.19及更早版本。 易於利用的漏洞允許未經身份驗證的攻擊者通過多種協議進行網絡訪問,從而危害MySQL服務器. 成功攻擊此漏洞可能導致未經授權的能力導致MySQL服務器掛起或頻繁可重複崩潰(完整的DOS). CVSS 3.0 基本分數 7.5 (影響因素). CVSS Vector: (CVSS:3.0/AV:N/AC:L/PR:N/UI:N/S:U/C:N/I:N/A:H).

Vulnerability in the MySQL Server component of Oracle MySQL (subcomponent: Server: DML). The supported version that is affected is 5.7.11 to 5.7.17. Easily "exploitable" vulnerability allows low privileged attacker with network access via multiple protocols to compromise MySQL Server. Successful attacks of this vulnerability can result in unauthorized ability to cause a hang or frequently repeatable crash (complete DOS) of MySQL Server. CVSS 3.0 Base Score 6.5 (Availability impacts). CVSS Vector: (CVSS:3.0/AV:N/AC:L/PR:L/UI:N/S:U/C:N/I:N/A:H).

Description.p: Oracle MySQL的MySQL Server組件(子組件: Server: Security: Encryption)中的漏洞. 受影響的支援版本是5.7.17及其更早版本. 攻擊漏洞很難允許低權限攻擊者通過多種協議訪問網路來破壞MySQL Server. 此漏洞的成功攻擊可能導致未經授權的更新,插入或刪除部分MySQL Server可訪問的數據. CVSS 3.0 Base Score 3.1 (完整性影響). CVSS Vector: (CVSS:3.0/AV:N/AC:H/PR:L/UI:N/S:U/C:N/I:L/A:N).

Description.p: Oracle MySQL的MySQL Server組件(子組件: Server: Security: Pluggable Auth)中的漏洞. 受影響的支援版本是5.6.35及其更早版本和5.7.17及其更早版本. 易受攻擊的漏洞允許未經身份驗證的攻擊者通過多種協議進行網路訪問,從而危害MySQL Server. 此漏洞的成功攻擊可能導致未經授權的功能,使得MySQL Server hang或經常重複的當機(完整的DOS). CVSS 3.0 Base Score 7.5 (可用性影響). CVSS Vector: (CVSS:3.0/AV:N/AC:L/PR:N/UI:N/S:U/C:N/I:N/A:H). 注：以前的信息是從2017年4月的CPU. Oracle沒有評論,第三方聲稱這個問題是sql/auth/sql_authentication.cc中的整數溢出問題,它允許遠端攻擊者通過精心設計的認證封包導致拒絕服務.

Solutions.summary: 升級到最新版本的 Oracle MySQL

Description.p: Oracle MySQL的MySQL Server組件(子組件: Server: Security: Client mysqldump)中的漏洞. 受影響的支援版本是5.5.54及其更早版本和5.6.35及其更早版本,以及5.7.17及其更早版本. 攻擊漏洞很難讓高權限攻擊者通過多種協議訪問網路來破壞MySQL Server. 這個漏洞的成功攻擊可能導致接管MySQL Server. 注: CVE-2017-3600 is equivalent to CVE-2016-5483. CVSS 3.0 Base Score 6.6 (機密性,完整性和可用性影響). CVSS Vector: (CVSS:3.0/AV:N/AC:H/PR:H/UI:N/S:U/C:H/I:H/A:H).

Solutions.summary: 升級到最新版本的 Oracle MySQL

Description.p: Oracle MySQL的MySQL Server組件中的漏洞 (子組件: 伺服器: Memcached). 受影響的支援版本是5.6.36及更早版本以及5.7.18及更早版本。 難以利用漏洞允許通過Memcached進行網絡訪問的未經身份驗證的攻擊者破壞MySQL服務器. 成功攻擊此漏洞可能導致未經授權的能力導致MySQL服務器掛起或頻繁可重複崩潰(完整的DOS)以及未經授權的更新,插入或刪除對某些MySQL服務器可訪問數據的訪問. Description.p: Oracle MySQL的MySQL連接器組件中的漏洞 (子組件: Connector/C). 受影響的支援版本是6.1.10及更早版本。 難以利用漏洞允許低權限攻擊者通過多種協議進行網絡訪問以破壞MySQL連接器. 成功攻擊此漏洞可能導致未經授權的能力導致MySQL連接器掛起或頻繁可重複崩潰(完整的DOS). 注意: 該文檔也已更新,以正確使用mysql_stmt_close(). 請參見: https://dev.mysql.com/doc/refman/5.7/en/mysql-stmt-execute.html, https://dev.mysql.com/doc/refman/5.7/en/mysql-stmt-fetch.html, https://dev.mysql.com/doc/refman/5.7/en/mysql-stmt-close.html, https://dev.mysql.com/doc/refman/5.7/en/mysql-stmt-error.html, https://dev.mysql.com/doc/refman/5.7/en/mysql-stmt-errno.html, and https://dev.mysql.com/doc/refman/5.7/en/mysql-stmt-sqlstate.html. Vulnerability in the MySQL Server component of Oracle MySQL (subcomponent: Server : Partition). Supported versions that are affected are 5.5.58 and prior, 5.6.38 and prior and 5.7.19 and prior. Easily exploitable vulnerability allows low privileged attacker with network access via multiple protocols to compromise MySQL Server. Successful attacks of this vulnerability can result in unauthorized ability to cause a hang or frequently repeatable crash (complete DOS) of MySQL Server as well as unauthorized update, insert or delete access to some of MySQL Server accessible data. CVSS 3.0 Base Score 7.1 (Integrity and Availability impacts). CVSS Vector: (CVSS:3.0/AV:N/AC:L/PR:L/UI:N/S:U/C:N/I:L/A:H).

Solutions.summary: 升級到最新版本的 Oracle MySQL

Description.p: Vulnerability in the MySQL Server component of Oracle MySQL (subcomponent: Server: InnoDB). Supported versions that are affected are 5.7.20 and prior. Easily exploitable vulnerability allows high privileged attacker with network access via multiple protocols to compromise MySQL Server. Successful attacks of this vulnerability can result in unauthorized ability to cause a hang or frequently repeatable crash (complete DOS) of MySQL Server. CVSS 3.0 Base Score 4.9 (Availability impacts). CVSS Vector: (CVSS:3.0/AV:N/AC:L/PR:H/UI:N/S:U/C:N/I:N/A:H).

Solutions.summary: 升級到最新版本的 Oracle MySQL

Supported versions that are affected are 5.5.59 and prior, 5.6.39 and prior and 5.7.21 and prior. Easily exploitable vulnerability allows low privileged attacker with network access via multiple protocols to compromise MySQL Server. Successful attacks of this vulnerability can result in unauthorized ability to cause a hang or frequently repeatable crash (complete DOS) of MySQL Server. CVSS 3.0 Base Score 6.5 (Availability impacts). CVSS Vector: (CVSS:3.0/AV:N/AC:L/PR:L/UI:N/S:U/C:N/I:N/A:H).
